, D-Calif., who stood by Ms. Gabrielle Giffords ' hospital bed Wednesday when her left eye fluttered open. Her right eye was damaged and is still bandaged. Ms. Kirsten Gillibrand said the congresswomen were telling Ms. Gabrielle Giffords how proud we were of her, and how she was inspiring the whole nation with her courage and with her strength. And then Debbie Wasserman Schultz and I started joking about all the things we were going to do after she got better. He will now be traveling across the state to listen and learn about how Hoosiers think we might best contribute in the years ahead. That begins Friday. Mike Pence , who flew today to Indiana from Washington, is holding a town hall meeting in Pendleton at 10 a.m. and speaking to Muncie Central High School students at 1:20 p.m.

Senator Kirsten Gillibrand echoed the mayor's call for gun control. Each also mentioned the recent Arizona shootings. Christine Quinn paraphrased Mavy Stodard, who was shielded from the gunman's fire by her husband who died. He gave his life, so that I could live, Christine Quinn said, summarizing Stodard's words at her husband's funeral Sunday." And it will be very hard to go on without him. But I have to honor what he did, and live my life
